main event: An unidentified aerial object was observed near Tinker AFB in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma on September 30, 1950.
interesting points: The object had an elliptical shape and a diameter of 25-35 feet., It was observed moving silently at a high altitude of approximately 10,000 feet., The sighting lasted about 3 minutes before the object vanished suddenly., The object was reported to move slowly from north to south., The estimated speed of the object was between 300-400 mph.
witness description: Sgt Randall D. Fowler of the Intelligence Section of the 513th Reconnaissance Squadron
